summary:
Bragoth the Orc, a Hunter and Blacksmith by trade built this home.
No one knows how long its been lying empty, but its perfect for any adventurer looking for a home on the outskirts of Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[b]A New Home[/b] is set to be a series of player homes added to the land of Skyrim for everyone and anyone to enjoy.

This first installation is A New Home on the outskirts of Whiterun, following the path from Riverwood to Whiterun your new home is hard to miss, it sits on the river between 2 waterfalls.

[i]An Orc named Bragoth, Hunter and Blacksmith to trade, built this home here because he felt the location was perfect for hunting wildlife while utilizing the natural waterfalls to his advantage of controlling the temperature of his Smelter and Forge.

Bragoth has been missing for quite some time now and presumed dead, all that is known of his whereabouts is the note left on his table, thus his house is available for anyone that could find use of it and turn it into a home again.[/i]

What this mod inludes:
[list][*]A beautiful lore friendly home for you
[*]Tanning rack
[*]Grinder
[*]Workbench
[*]Smelter
[*]Forge
[*]Bookshelves
[*]Various labeled storage containers
[*]Weapon racks and plaques
[*]Mannequins
[*]Wood Chopping Block[/list]

--Changelog--
v2:
Added Woodchopping Block to the property
Added Map Marker
v1:
Initial Release


==INSTALLATION==
install via NMM or just drop the ANewHomeWR.esp into your Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder and activate it.
Remember to [b]ALWAYS[/b] back up your saves when adding, deleting or updating mods


This is my first attempt at making a mod so any problems with it please let me know and I shall try to fix it.

Enjoy
[i][b]-KHCloud[/b][/i]
author: KHCloud
